roleset.name: engage in (usually physical) play; goof off

example.name: horseplay-n
example.text: The fact that it was then euphemized as " some horseplay in the showers " by administration officials is something that really outrages me .
example.umr: (s5o3 / outrage-01 :ARG0 (s5e / euphemize-01 :ARG0 (s5p / person :refer-numbr plural :ARG1-of (s5h / have-org-role-92 :ARG3 (s5o2 / official) :ARG4 (s5a / administer-01))) :ARG1 (s5t2 / thing :refer-person 3rd :refer-number singular) :ARG2 (s5h2 / horse-around-01 :mod (s5s / some) :place (s5s2 / shower :refer-number plural) :aspect activity :modal-strength full-affirmative) :temporal (s5t / then) :aspect performance :modal-strength full-affirmative) :ARG1 (s5p2 / person :refer-person 1st :refer-number singular) :degree intensifier :aspect state :modal-strength full-affirmative)
